title: Bache Educational Docs: Book-first, provenance-aware topic summaries (Christopher M. Bache, LSD and the Mind of the Universe)
description: Scholarly, citation-grounded educational documents synthesizing Christopher M. Bache’s LSD and the Mind of the Universe (2019) and public talks (2014–2025). Book quotes are primary; timestamped talk excerpts add context. Built for research, teaching, and RAG systems.
keywords: LSD and the Mind of the Universe
notes: Built pages live at the GitHub Pages URL. Each topic page includes provenance and fair-use notes.
